1: <mistake>@@//'gyur</mistake> <mistake>ro//de</mistake> 'i sngon <mistake>m</mistake> thos pa'i bzo <mistake>dng</mistake> rtsis dang shes <mistake>bdang/ bstan</mistake> bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal bar yang dag par <mistake>togs</mistake> par 'gyur <mistake>ro//shin</mistake> du
2: <mistake>/yongs</mistake> <mistake>su</mistake> dag pa'i tshul khrims <mistake>dang/'tsho</mistake> ba <mistake>dang/ kun</mistake> du <mistake>spyong</mistake> pa spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur <mistake>ro//legs</mistake> par rab tu 'byung ba <mistake>dang/ legs</mistake> par ba snyen par <mistake>rzogs</mistake> par 'gyur <mistake>ro //thams</mistake>
3: <mistake>/cad</mistake> mkhyen pa nyid <mistake>dang/ byang</mistake> chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyur <mistake>ro//nyan</mistake> thos dang dgra bcom pa <mistake>dang/rang</mistake> sangs rgyas kyi <mistake>nges</mistake> pa <mistake>dang/ bgrod</mistake> pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur <mistake>ro//</mistake>
4: <mistake>@a/'din</mistake> 'khor lo <mistake>lna</mistake> pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig <mistake>go///lag</mistake> <mistake>n</mistake> rdo rje rdo rje <mistake>'chang/ daltar</mistake> <mistake>yo'</mistake> tan dpag tu <mistake>medg</mistake> pa dang yang dag <mistake>phar</mistake> ldan par 'gyur <mistake>go//rnam</mistake> pa de lta <mistake>bu'i</mistake> yon tan dpag
5: tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur <mistake>ro//lag</mistake> na rdo rje rdo rje <mistake>chang/ don</mistake> <mistake>dama</mistake> pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa <mistake>'dgi</mistake> <mistake>ying</mistake> dag par <mistake>'dzin</mistake> pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs <mistake>panr</mistake>
6: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par <mistake>basgs</mistake> <mistake>te/ shin</mistake> tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs <mistake>nas/ blana</mistake> med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon <mistake>par</mistake>
7: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur <mistake>ro//bskal</mistake> pa mang por yongs su mya <mistake>nga n</mistake> las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis <mistake>semas</mistake> can thams cad kyi bla na med <mistake>pa'</mistake> <mistake>cos</mistake> ston pa po <mistake>dang phyogs</mistake> bcur chos kyi <mistake>rngbo</mistake> che <mistake>lhang</mistake>
8: <mistake>/par</mistake> gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur <mistake>no//'di</mistake> ni 'khor lo drug pa'i rjes su bsngags <mistake>pa dpag</mistake> tu med <mistake>pa'o////ao</mistake> <mistake>sar+ba+amak+hAa ba</mistake> <mistake>sa</mistake> <mistake>bhA +Aabi</mistake> <mistake>shud+ta</mistake> <mistake>bdzrwa a</mistake> <mistake>a'a</mistake> <mistake>ai a6</mistake> pra kri ti pa ri <mistake>shu+bhasd+za</mistake>
